snippet: The Sarbanes-Oxley law was fiercely attacked when it was passed in 2002, but for all the criticism, the law did help clean up corporate accounting.
abstract: The Sarbanes-Oxley law was fiercely attacked when it was passed in 2002, but for all the criticism, the law did help clean up corporate accounting.

headline.main: To Envision Dodd-Frank's Future, Look to Its Predecessor
headline.print_headline: In Finance, Past Hints At Future
